data.author: Michael Phelps

data.quote: Exercise should be regarded as tribute to the heart.
data.author: Gene Tunney

data.quote: Number one, like yourself. Number two, you have to eat healthy. And number three, you've got to squeeze your buns. That's my formula.
data.author: Richard Simmons

data.quote: Practice puts brains in your muscles.
data.author: Sam Snead

data.quote: Our growing softness, our increasing lack of physical fitness, is a menace to our security.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: You can always improve your fitness if you keep training.
data.author: Pastor Maldonado

data.quote: I don't smoke, don't drink much, and go to the gym five times a week. I live a healthy lifestyle and feel great. I can run a marathon, you know.
data.author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

data.quote: Fitness is important, but the most important thing is how you adapt and the way you feel physically. To adapt to a new position. To try to change your game.
data.author: Fernando Torres

data.quote: A feeble body weakens the mind.
data.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

data.quote: The value and utility of any experiment are determined by the fitness of the material to the purpose for which it is used, and thus in the case before us it cannot be immaterial what plants are subjected to experiment and in what manner such experiment is conducted.
data.author: Gregor Mendel

data.quote: Resting for me is fitness training.
data.author: Jenson Button

data.quote: Fitness needs to be perceived as fun and games or we subconsciously avoid it.
data.author: Alan Thicke

data.quote: My wife and I work out together almost every day. It's just a great way to spend time together. We're going to run a marathon together later this year, and that's one more goal that we'll accomplish as husband and wife.
data.author: Bill Rancic

data.quote: In my judgment, physical fitness is basic to all forms of excellence and to a strong, confident nation.
data.author: Robert Kennedy

data.quote: Sport is not just about entertainment. It is equally about winning and losing, pooling and galvanising the energy of the youth, upgrading people's physical fitness and mental prowess.
data.author: Nita Ambani

data.quote: My fitness journey will be a lifelong journey.
data.author: Khloe Kardashian

data.quote: As a longtime practitioner of yoga and a person who's been involved in physical fitness my whole life, I can tell you, yoga helps you achieve altered states of consciousness. It is not just stretching. The only way you can say that it's stretching is if you haven't done it, or that you haven't done it rigorously for a long period of time.
data.author: Joe Rogan

data.quote: Regularity in the hours of rising and retiring, perseverance in exercise, adaptation of dress to the variations of climate, simple and nutritious aliment, and temperance in all things are necessary branches of the regimen of health.
data.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

data.quote: Exercise is the chief source of improvement in our faculties.
data.author: Hugh Blair

data.quote: I like exercise. I like a healthy body.
data.author: Erin Gray

data.quote: If it weren't for the fact that the TV set and the refrigerator are so far apart, some of us wouldn't get any exercise at all.
data.author: Joey Adams

data.quote: I attend to my fitness. I go the gym every day and try to maintain my physical fitness; without that, it is tough to take challenges on the chess board.
data.author: Viswanathan Anand

data.quote: I have never taken any exercise, except sleeping and resting, and I never intend to take any.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: You must also give mental and physical fitness priority.
data.author: Jim Otto

data.quote: Promoting healthy lifestyles and encouraging fitness are so important for our children's development and reducing the nation's epidemic of childhood obesity.
data.author: Marcia Fudge

data.quote: I try and groom myself, be it through fitness or dance.
data.author: Yami Gautam

data.quote: My weight fluctuates depending on my mood and my current devotion to my fitness routine.
data.author: Lena Dunham

data.quote: Don't get hung up on the size. If you feel bad about yourself because a 12 is what fits, take a Sharpie, and write '6' on the label.
data.author: Stacy London

data.quote: It's so easy to lose your fitness and so hard to gain it back.
data.author: Alex Morgan

data.quote: When the child begins to think and to make use of the written language to express his rudimentary thinking, he is ready for elementary work; and this fitness is a question not of age or other incidental circumstance but of mental maturity.
data.author: Maria Montessori

data.quote: I don't lift weights. I do fitness exercises to stay strong.
data.author: Chad le Clos

data.quote: The first time I see a jogger smiling, I'll consider it.
data.author: Joan Rivers

data.quote: Exercise is labor without weariness.
data.author: Samuel Johnson

data.quote: For exercise, I now run with my chocolate Lab puppy, Oscar.
data.author: Daniela Pestova

data.quote: I would rather exercise than read a newspaper.
data.author: Kim Alexis

data.quote: Like most people I can be lazy, so it's nice to have a goal or deadline or reason to work out. I feel better when I get to exercise, or when I'm outdoors. I like to hike, swim and run, and I love to play soccer.
data.author: Viggo Mortensen

data.quote: I didn't have the same fitness or ability as the other girls, so I had to beat them with my mind.
data.author: Martina Hingis

data.quote: I think it's more important to be fit so that you can be healthy and enjoy activities than it is to have a good body.
data.author: Rachel Blanchard

data.quote: It's challenging, but you have to at least try to eat right and exercise.
data.author: Joely Fisher

data.quote: You can't get rid of it with exercise alone. You can do the most vigorous exercise and only burn up 300 calories in an hour. If you've got fat on your body, the exercise firms and tones the muscles. But when you use that tape measure, what makes it bigger? It's the fat!
data.author: Jack LaLanne

data.quote: I love to swim for miles I could just go back and forth.
data.author: Jill Clayburgh

data.quote: What's important is to get into shape and then not to have to worry about it. I don't want to get on stage and not being able to do something. Not being physically fit doesn't work for me.
data.author: Chris Cornell

data.quote: My job is to be fit and I'm really blessed that I get to go and work out and live a really healthy lifestyle.
data.author: Kerri Walsh Jennings

data.quote: Fitness is not an option. It's part of my job.
data.author: Alison Sweeney

data.quote: No one ceases to be a man, no one forfeits his rights to civilization merely by being more or less uncultured, and since the Filipino is regarded as a fit citizen when he is asked to pay taxes or shed his blood to defend the fatherland, why must this fitness be denied him when the question arises of granting him some right?
data.author: Jose Rizal

data.quote: I love fitness, yoga. I love fashion. On the weekends, I try to relax. I have pretty crazy weeks. I like spas and nice dinners. I'm not much of a club person. I like to hang on the beach in Malibu.
data.author: Charlotte McKinney

data.quote: You can be in excellent physical shape, with low cholesterol, a healthy body weight and good overall physical fitness - but that doesn't necessarily mean you're healthy.
data.author: Michael Greger

data.quote: The spirit of the Olympic movement is great for young people because it teaches them about the training and discipline required to compete. Even if they don't make the teams, they can rededicate their lives to the art of sport, discipline, and physical fitness.
data.author: Richard M. Daley

data.quote: I suffer panic attacks which has made me really conscious about my fitness and I have become addicted to jogging. It might sound odd but a lot of good has come out of it. My fans send letters saying they have taken up jogging because I do it.
data.author: Ellie Goulding

data.quote: Fitness is a luxury when you are busy!
data.author: Lauren Conrad

data.quote: Never, ever exercise in front of a TV or while reading. You lose 50 percent of the benefit of the exercise by not hearing and feeling your heart rate, your sweat and the pain levels that need to be encountered in fitness training.
data.author: Kevin R. Stone

data.quote: If you ask me about my success story, the secret is I know when to pull myself back. I don't overexpose myself; I give proper gaps whenever I can. I do not over spend myself, I keep myself busy in lot of activities. I really work hard; I work harder than others, by focussing on my fitness level and studying music.
data.author: Sonu Nigam

data.quote: I am pleased with the fitness that I have.
data.author: Lin Dan

data.quote: My own preferred fitness regime is to use my bicycle.
data.author: Paul Hollywood

data.quote: Fitness, defending, the mental stuff - those were all weaknesses of mine. And I turned those into strengths.
data.author: Carli Lloyd

data.quote: I do a lot of biking. I need that mileage and the long-distance stuff because tennis demands it. My fitness trainer is always trying to convince me to do an Ironman. I can probably run the marathon, I can make the 112 miles on the bike, but I will never swim for 2.4 miles. I will die after 100 meters.
data.author: Tomas Berdych

data.quote: It takes about four days of virtuous living to create a little weight loss. That also happens to be the time required to get used to eating less. In other words, if you can get past day three of a fitness regimen, things improve.
data.author: Martha Beck

data.quote: I'm quite into fitness, and I have a fantastic personal trainer who knows me, knows my body, knows when to push me, and knows when not to push me. She doesn't make me do 20 burpees in a row and instead focuses on strengthening my core, telling me we need to focus on making me into 'a tall giraffe'!
data.author: Poppy Delevingne

data.quote: Teaching kids about health and fitness is important to me. It's about being fit for life.
data.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

data.quote: People need to have clear goals about why they are exercising, and they should consult a fitness expert to find out what kind of exercise is suitable.
data.author: Lynn Davies

data.quote: For me, triathlons were something that was down to me and my fitness. Now, I really enjoy the pain in the triathlon of chasing someone down. It's a bit like chasing down Nico Rosberg in the last few laps at Silverstone - it makes you feel alive.
data.author: Jenson Button

data.quote: If someone thinks, 'I'll spend the off season working on my fitness and I'll come back a better cricketer,' I don't think that's enough. You need to spend a lot of time working on your skills and honing your skills.
data.author: Rahul Dravid

data.quote: I try to come at fitness and nutrition from a perspective of gentleness and what will make me feel good afterwards. I try to stay out of the mindset of needing to fix myself. I do whatever seems fun to me.
data.author: Taylor Schilling

data.quote: Muscles come and go flab lasts.
data.author: Bill Vaughan

data.quote: I recommend that people try new stuff or take new fitness classes all the time. It's important to mix up your routine, not only for your body, but also for your mental state.
data.author: Alison Sweeney

data.quote: I think if you exercise, your state of mind - my state of mind - is usually more at ease, ready for more mental challenges. Once I get the physical stuff out of the way it always seems like I have more calmness and better self-esteem.
data.author: Stone Gossard

data.quote: Training is such a vital part of preparation for a game, you really do train to play. It tops up your ability, like sharpening a carving knife. You can get away with not doing it for a while, as long as you have reached a certain standard of fitness.
data.author: Graeme Le Saux

data.quote: Oh, and once, when I was in the Marines, I got a perfect score on my physical fitness test.
data.author: Drew Carey

data.quote: My Daddy liked physical fitness and wanted me to be a prizefighter.
data.author: Judy Johnson

data.quote: Cycling keeps me lean and I need to stay in shape, especially as I still like eating chocolate and ice-cream! I like to go mountain biking too. Running is also good; it's what we were designed to do as humans, so it comes naturally.
data.author: Mark Webber

data.quote: I would like to thank everyone who supported me to be fit for the Euros. I had some fitness problems before the tournament, but I am here now!
data.author: Andriy Shevchenko

data.quote: Fitness has always been one of the top priorities in my life because that's the way I grew up, with soccer being the sport of choice.
data.author: Ziggy Marley

data.quote: Our children are obese, either have or being threatened by diabetes, high blood pressure, high cholesterol, and not socially adjusting properly to others because of a lack of fitness.
data.author: Richard Simmons

data.quote: I can jog, but I can't run. That's hard for me. I like the fact that I can jog for fitness, but to me there's a huge difference between jogging and running.
data.author: Mary Decker

data.quote: For years, I always thought it was hilarious that I was this fitness guru, because fitness was just a tool I utilized to help people improve their confidence. For me, it's never been about fitness. It's always been about helping to empower people.
data.author: Jillian Michaels

data.quote: A drunkard in the gutter is just where he ought to be, according to the fitness and tendency of things. Nature has set upon him the process of decline and dissolution by which she removes things which have survived their usefulness.
data.author: William Graham Sumner

data.quote: If a man achieves victory over this body, who in the world can exercise power over him? He who rules himself rules over the whole world.
data.author: Vinoba Bhave

data.quote: I've exercised with women so thin that buzzards followed them to their cars.
data.author: Erma Bombeck

data.quote: Never hurry. Take plenty of exercise. Always be cheerful. Take all the sleep you need. You may expect to be well.
data.author: James Freeman Clarke

data.quote: Exercise is done against one's wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse.
data.author: George A. Sheehan

data.quote: I wanted to get really fit. I wanted to lose some weight. So I've been doing Pilates and yoga, trying to lean out my body so I won't be bulky.
data.author: Serena Williams

data.quote: What's wrong with extreme dieting and hard-core fitness plans is that they don't take into account the rest of your life.
data.author: Alison Sweeney

data.quote: When you're singing, you're using extra muscles, and it requires a lot of exercise and breathing. You can't do that if you're a sissy. If I have any fitness advice for people, I'd tell them to sing more. It's good therapy, too.
data.author: Willie Nelson

data.quote: Doing nothing would stress me out. So I am still pretty much active practicing judo with my friends, who are former judo athletes, to maintain our fitness as well as the friendships among us. In my spare time, I usually go jogging around the Gelora Bung Karno stadium or head to the gym.
data.author: Joe Taslim

data.quote: People assume that you need to run fast to get to optimum fitness, but the truth is endurance lifting makes you stronger and leaner.
data.author: Greg Rutherford

data.quote: I would say 90 percent of the stuff we do is technical anyway. If you look at a two-hour training day, 12 minutes are probably spent running or gaining fitness.
data.author: Ashton Eaton

data.quote: Mental fitness is served by consciously redirecting our attention away from the constant bombardment from the media whose reason to be seems to be focused on keeping us in a state of constant alert.
data.author: David Perlmutter

data.quote: In my view, fitness training isn't that important in England, as they all train with such intensity anyway and have a competitive edge when just sprinting. The matches are all hard-fought, too.
data.author: Claudio Ranieri

data.quote: I do yoga, I do Bikram and I run, and I eat really healthy.
data.author: Lady Gaga

data.quote: One of the things I've always enjoyed is moving around and staying fit. Physicality is such a big part of being an actor, but it's also about stillness and silence.
data.author: Joel Edgerton

data.quote: Being a dancer is my metaphor for life because you have to know your body. Being a dancer and paying attention to fitness is all about moving in balance.
data.author: Goldie Hawn

data.quote: Just as you can't blindly follow fashion, you can't follow fitness, either.
data.author: Anushka Sharma

data.quote: I'm not a fitness model; I'm just a singer. If people focus on that, that's what I care about.
data.author: Alessia Cara

data.quote: I've been into exercise my whole life, been a runner and been into health and fitness always.
data.author: Sissy Spacek

data.quote: I tell my sons all the time, 'The most important thing in your life is fitness,' but a lot of fighters go overboard.
data.author: George Foreman

data.quote: I created a fitness club with five friends. We have weekly check-ins and a reward system - and group penalties if one of us slacks off.
data.author: Bryce Dallas Howard

data.quote: There is a moment when you get older when your metabolism slows down and you don't feel like working out any more, so you don't want to keep yourself fit any more, but that's your decision. Why should you be judged for it?
data.author: Janet Jackson

data.quote: I say, 'Use it or lose it.' I have my own fitness regime, which is centred around stretching, free-weights and fast walking. I also have a trainer half of the year, as I spend my summers in the south of France where I swim a lot.
data.author: Joan Collins

data.quote: My assumption was that people are already motivated to go to a fitness class. That's who I am. I was already ready to go out there and get to class. All I needed was a search tool. But it turns out people need more than that, and that's why gym memberships exist.
data.author: Payal Kadakia

data.quote: Some people have that school of thought where fitness isn't enjoyable, but we're making it enjoyable, I think, by making it more fun, challenging, and engaging rather than this boring thing that you have to do. It's about using technology and data to change this experience.
data.author: Payal Kadakia

data.quote: The manager and the fitness staff condition every training session. They plan it out week by week on what players need. If players need a rest, they will do that; if players need to work hard, they will do that as well.
data.author: Harry Kane

data.quote: We've all tried to bunk our gym session or dance class. A single routine can get monotonous. That's why I have decided to make my fitness regime fun by incorporating different workouts into my schedule. From dancing to yoga, I plan to keep it as interesting as possible so I'm never bored of working out.
data.author: Disha Patani

data.quote: I understand only three things - films, fitness, and food.
data.author: Rakul Preet Singh

data.quote: For fitness, I've just bought a watch which keeps a track of how many calories I burn, what's my heart rate, which is very fascinating.
data.author: Yami Gautam

data.quote: All we're trying to do is change how people think about fitness. And build Under Armour into the biggest brand in the entire land.
data.author: Kevin Plank

data.quote: For a while after college, I was thinking of becoming a fitness trainer, and I am a certified aqua trainer.
data.author: Dylan Lauren

data.quote: When you get into the final week of the Tour de France, it becomes a different kind of race. As the distance and the fatigue really tell, that is when it becomes a proper test of everyone's fitness.
data.author: Bradley Wiggins

data.quote: I can work hard and be disciplined like a soldier, but I could never reach their level of fitness.
data.author: Richard C. Armitage

data.quote: I try to keep at a non-obsessive level of fitness. It's not about looking great, it's about just feeling good. So I do a lot of yoga. Bikram just blows my mind. It's mental as well as physical; if I don't train, I get very depressed.
data.author: Richard C. Armitage

data.quote: It's not like I was trying to be sexy but I had to get fit because I had to be able to do stunts. Also I wanted that, if Bond took his clothes off, he looked like a man who did what he did, which was kill people for a living. I thought the only way to do that was to work out and get fit and buff and get physically into shape.
data.author: Daniel Craig

data.quote: When I was back to 100 per cent fitness, I was able to show what I was capable of. I like to think I will bring a freshness into the Euros, and now that I am captain, I am going to do my best to take responsibility.
data.author: Eden Hazard

data.quote: At the start of his second term, one wonders less about Obama's fitness than his willingness: Why doesn't he do more to build and maintain the relationships required to govern in era of polarization?
data.author: Ron Fournier

data.quote: In the British Special Air Service, combat fitness is all about running.
data.author: Bear Grylls

data.quote: I never stop working when I'm on stage, and that's my fitness.
data.author: Jessie J

data.quote: At my first Olympics, I didn't have a contract, and I wasn't making any money. After my first Olympics, I was working at 24 Hour Fitness at the front desk. I would go to practice in the morning, run home, shower, grab some food and then go straight to work. I didn't get off of work until 10 or 11 o'clock at night.
data.author: Michelle Carter

data.quote: I'm French, so I'm quite lazy about exercising, and I smoke. But I do love going for a run in the morning with my dog. That's all.
data.author: Eva Green

data.quote: I took up boxing as a fitness thing. I got obsessed, and I would go every day when I wasn't working. It's just an insane sport when you get into it.
data.author: Lena Headey

data.quote: For most athletes, there's a focus on your own fitness, but I have to rely on my horse, too. I've been very lucky so far, and it hasn't presented a problem, but you can never count on a competition going as planned until you're there and actually doing it.
data.author: Charlotte Dujardin

data.quote: I'm not a waif-y girl and never will be. I think it's healthy when fitness experts encourage fitness rather than getting a certain body shape.
data.author: Sophia Bush

data.quote: As Mick Jagger will tell you, performing is an aerobic work-out. I've got the bass guitar, which is the heaviest of all the instruments, and I'm a little girl, in boiling-hot leather under the lights. You have to keep the fitness level up if you want to look good up there.
data.author: Suzi Quatro

data.quote: For much of the year, you're just trying to maintain your fitness. It's not often you get a lot of time to really concentrate on improving it.
data.author: Andy Murray

data.quote: My fitness trainer's English, my physio's English, some of my friends are English. I don't have a problem with English people at all.
data.author: Andy Murray

data.quote: Staying more controlled mentally stemmed from taking my fitness more seriously. When you're doing track work, sprints and so on, it's pretty painful, but that does make you feel better prepared and therefore mentally stronger when you're going into a match. You know, without a doubt, that you are strong enough to last.
data.author: Andy Murray

data.quote: Early in my career, I got roles that demanded that I be fit to carry off the angry young man look. Of course, I'm a fitness freak, and that's something I picked up from my dad.
data.author: Akkineni Nagarjuna

data.quote: While I try to keep my fitness regimen consistent, during awards season, I'm especially conscious of what I'll be wearing and plan my workouts accordingly.
data.author: Kate Hudson

data.quote: I'm doing four hours of gymnastics training a day, six days a week and then an extra two to three hours in a fitness center as well.
data.author: Shawn Johnson

data.quote: I haven't always been into fitness. But I noticed that when I'd be on stage playing a show, I could hardly make it through the fifth song without having to take a breather.
data.author: Thomas Rhett

data.quote: We talk a lot on 'Biggest Loser' about how fitness is a natural antidepressant, how it burns off stress. What I like about running is that it gives me time alone. I'm always busy, with people at work, with my kids. I love getting out for a run by myself and just listening to my music.
data.author: Alison Sweeney

data.quote: I have been through various fitness regimes. I used to run about five miles a day and I did aerobics for a while.
data.author: Sting

data.quote: Virat Kohli has so far shown that he has more ability and talent than anybody else, and if he can play till 32 or 34 with same fitness and without injuries, he will come to a point where not even Vivian Richards neither Sachin Tendulkar had such a record.
data.author: Kapil Dev

data.quote: Obviously, your family life is the priority, but there's still other stuff you have to get done in a day. I think the way I make it work is by taking care of myself, and that includes fitness and eating right and all those things, but also by being very organized and punctual.
data.author: Cindy Crawford

data.quote: I think when you come to Australia you immediately get the sense of fitness and taking care of yourself and being healthy, and it really shows.
data.author: Tinie Tempah

data.quote: I go to the gym every day. That tends to taper off when I'm at a tournament. During tournaments, I'm not trying to build fitness. I'm simply trying to keep away any kind of tension. I go for long walks to clear my head.
data.author: Viswanathan Anand

data.quote: Even though I'm not a competitive athlete, I have to still maintain things and try to keep myself fit because I am at that age where I need to make sure to get those regular checkups and make sure everything is in tact.
data.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

data.quote: To hear both critics and defenders talk about the fitness of Judge Sonia Sotomayor for the Supreme Court, you'd think the most successful Supreme Court justices had been warm, collegial consensus-builders. But history tells a different story.
data.author: Noah Feldman

data.quote: Too much redesign has to do more with fad and fashion than with fitness and function. It is change for the sake of change. Such redesign is not only unnecessary, it is all too often also retrogressive, leading to things that work less effectively than those they were designed to replace.
data.author: Henry Petroski

data.quote: Imagine how many women could excel in science if not for the pernicious myth that science and math are a man's game. Likewise, fitness isn't defined by the Arnold Schwarzeneggers of the world.
data.author: Kyle Hill

data.quote: Faith can make no appeal to reason or the fitness of things; its appeal is to the Word of God, and whatever is therein revealed, faith accepts as true.
data.author: Edward McKendree Bounds

data.quote: I can't eat whatever I want, definitely not. I'm always controlled because I do a lot of fitness and triathlons, not just Formula One, so I always make sure I eat the right things.
data.author: Jenson Button

data.quote: As the proud father of two teens and past Chairman to the Presidents Council on Physical Fitness and Sports, I am committed to educating parents and especially young people on ways to live a long, healthy and active life.
data.author: Lee Haney

data.quote: When I was 10, I asked my parents for a set of weights. I had my Charles Atlas book to go along with that. Every time we went to the grocery store, I'd rush to the magazine area and read the ones with Arnold Schwarzenegger and all those guys on the covers: 'Pumping Iron,' 'Muscle and Fitness,' 'Muscle Builder by Joe Weider.'
data.author: Lee Haney
